page.title: 08Shops in Blackmore.
page.content: In Blackmore there are four{shops} grouped about Horsefair Green.There is Spar,Dadds,Crosse House Stores and the Post Office.Dadds was once a general store.At the side of Spar there is a hairdressers. The Crosse House Stores got its name from the cross roads.These shops are approximately 200 years old.Crosse House Stores was a bakery.{The shop keepers}start work at 5.00am and finish at 6.30pm.The busiest time of day for{trade}is 6.00am to 9.00am and 3.30pm to 5.00pm.The most popular{newspaper}is The Sun and the most popular comic is Jackie.The favourite magazine is Womans Own.The articles that people come in for most are newspapers and cigarettes.They like{Christmas}best because of the decorations ,gifts and interesting articals in magazines .
